page.title: 05SACRISTON SCHOOL GAMES P1
page.content:
POISON Somebody is chosen to be "on". He / she spreads out their fingers and each player holds on to one finger. He shouts out a word beginning with "p" when "poison" is called everybody runs away, one person is tug and he then chases someone else. The second person tug is "on" next.
TIGGY ON LINES
Players are chased but can only run on the lines of the netball ,etc., courts marked on the yard.
STUCK IN THE MUD
When a player is caught he must stand still and is not free until someone crawls under their legs . Three times caught and you are on.
